::Shadow Wing::

"Do I have a choice?"
She took off her sachel and grabbed her small lazar pistol out of her 
hip compartment. She pulled back on the chamber and loaded a fresh 
energon charge to it.
"Let's give that bot a chance. Then we go in together."
She looked into Lunarpine's eyes and saw the fire behind them.
She then looked out onto the battle field, "Think she'll have any 
luck?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lunarpine grinned, "She's got one chance, after that we try my type 
> of negotiations." giving a look at his rifle before turning back 
> towards Shadow Wing."You with me?"
>
